DOC.brief_title: GARDASIL™ Study Healthy Females Between 9 26 Years Age Sub-Saharan Africa ( V501-046 )
DOC.detailed_description: In Phase A study , healthy female 9 12 year age randomize ( 4:1 ) receive 3-dose regimen GARDASIL™ placebo , 13 26 year old receive GARDASIL™ . In Phase B study , participant receive placebo Phase A option receive 3-dose regimen GARDASIL™ .
